metadata.title: CVE-2022-37769 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: libjpeg commit 281daa9 was discovered to contain a segmentation fault via HuffmanDecoder::Get at huffmandecoder.hpp. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted file.

notes.note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8

criterions.comment: libjpeg package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
